dmca.title: Copyright infringement
dmca.body:
nc

  _____  

From: maryanne [mailto:maryanne@meowhoo.com] 
Sent: Saturday, April 02, 2005 2:33 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Copyright infringement


Lance Crosby, Esq.
1333 Stemmons Freeway
Suite 110
Dallas  TX  75207
 
April 2, 2005
 
Dear Sir,
 
Recently it has come to my attention that a website that my partner and I
have created, worked on and cultivated since September 2002 has been
duplicated and placed in another URL. As near as we can tell, over thirty of
our revenue-producing pages have been redirected to this pirated website,
and we are quite distressed. 
 
Our website, the original one is here http://www.meowhoo.com
<http://www.meowhoo.com/>   
 
You will see our names in the about section of the website here:
http://www.meowhoo.com/about/index.html
and you can see us here  http://www.meowhoo.com/about/index.html#team.
 
The other website;the fake, the charlatan the crook is here:
http://www.meowhoocat.hst0.com/
 
If you look through the duplicate site, you will see several things that
might make your alarm bells go off. 
 
*        First the website information is old, ours is current, still adding
listers daily. 
 
*        The photo contest features an old one, run last year. 

*        The games do not work. 

*        Most of the interior pages, except for those 30 some pages of ads
revert right back to us. 
 
So I guess this is a half-assed crook. I am sorry, but I am furious here
that this could have happened. We estimate this crook has cost us quite a
loss in revenue so far.
 
My partner in this venture lives in Israel. So you can get in touch with me
easier-
 
Mary Anne Miller
28510 Santiam Highway
Sweet Home  OR  97386
541-367-4927           (anytime)
 
Please we implore you to take this fake website off the Internet! 
 
We have already contacted a lawyer on this.  
 
I am also sending as per your instructions on your website 
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/ a copy of this letter in hard copy-
certified mail express delivery.
 
I have the following information about the cyber thief that our tech team
was able to come up with
 
Alexey Mints (HST0-COM-DOM)
840 8th Ave
New York, New York 10018
US
+380.629343549
akunamatata@mariupol.net

Domain Name: HST0.COM

Administrative Contact:
Alexey Mints akunamatata@mariupol.net
840 8th Ave
New York, New York 10018
US
+380.629343549
 
 
Alexey A. Mints (Saint Petersburg State University) [minz@decosp.spb.ru]
 
I hope that this information is sufficient for you to act promptly and
remove this person off the web!  I am so baffled that this has happened to
us. We thought we had covered all the possible domain names when we bought
Meowhoo.com .net .org etc.  
 
Also if you need it, my partner's name and address:
 
Anat El Hashahar (Anne Moss)
5 Tavor Street
Pardes Hana  Israel   37011
 
011-972-4-637-2021
 
We are both so distressed about this. I feel like my child has been
kidnapped. 
 
Please help us- I cannot obtain Anne's signature in a timely manner. I am
including mine as well as sending this via email to the address shown on
ThePlanet's website.
 
 
 
Sincerely,
 
 
 
 
Mary Anne Miller
Anne Moss
 
The REAL owners of Meowhoo.com
 
www.meowhoo.com
www.thecatsite.com
www.kitten-rescue.com
www.equinelove.com
www.hissy.net/
www.kittybytes.com/webcomposer/
www.catreviews.com
www.caninecrib.com/
www.endingpain.info
